column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: An accident occurred at 11:30 pm on June 3
column5: on Stung Meanchey Flyover in Stung Meanchey 1 District
column7: riding a motorbike at ultra-high speed hit a Highklander car from behind
column8: throwing him through the rear window.------The injured  man
column10: was seriously injured after flying into the car driven by a Chinese man. However
column11: he refused to go to the hospital until his relatives arrived.------ His motorbike was sent to Meanchey district traffic control to wait for a legal settlement with the car owner.------http://tdnewsasia.com/archives/56529
